message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.PL. 

This paper deals with distributed computing and fault tolerance, which are core topics in the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. It also involves algorithms and data structures for distributed systems, which falls under the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category. The paper also discusses consensus and agreement problems, which are relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with communication abstractions, which are relevant to the Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-category. Finally, the paper introduces a new broadcast communication abstraction, which falls under the Programming Languages (cs.PL) sub-category.
